title: Warren has questions how YouTube has changed me and the future of the church
description:
Warren Mills from Melbourne AU is back with questions for me this time. Here are the questions he sent. 

How has the JBP phenomenon changed you?
What remains as the central message of Jesus?
What is your legacy to your Internet audience?
What are you looking forward to most?
What advice do you have for your Christian and non Christian audience?
What role should the church play in the next 50 years?

We didn't get to them all. We talked about his book on the Golden Rule and other things too. https://www.bookdepository.com/How-Good-is-Golden-Rule-Warren-Mills/9780648497769 

Golden rule is a learning tool
The sermon on the mount and human flourishing Jonathan pennington https://amzn.to/2Daik3j
What is love
Robert Barron
Don Garlits King of the Dragsters https://amzn.to/33deLnX

Walter Wink
The inward journey, the interiority of our being, measured against our relationship with God. that sense of encounter and accountability. Our external journey, our relationship with others. 
Alfred North Whitehead 
First the natural then the spiritual
Instinctive drives, treating ourselves as being valuable, not just to ourselves but to God and to others. Trying to understand what the highest good is that we should pursue. 
Leads us into a symbiotic relationship of inward and outward. If we seek God we will find him. 
Making things with his hands and writing
Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/WkkHMTt The link will prompt you to download the software for this free group messaging service. This link updates every 100 users so look for the most recent videos if this link doesn't work.

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays me a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here. This is is one (free to you) way to support my videos. 

To support this channel/podcast on Paypal: https://paypal.me/paulvanderklay

To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin (BTC): 37TSN79RXewX8Js7CDMDRzvgMrFftutbPo 
To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin Cash (BCH) qr3amdmj3n2u83eqefsdft9vatnj9na0dqlzhnx80h 
To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://beta.lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A
